EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
2021 - 2024
Product Owner II, Humana, Louisville, KY
• Driving development work within the SAFE Agile structure
• Documenting business requirements for optimization of database
• Responsible for specification, definition, quality assurance testing, and production implementation
• Writing and prioritizing user stories
• Ensures product feature implementation.
• Prioritized backlog and product requests from multiple sources to deliver the most value to the organization.
• Facilitation of agile ceremonies
• Participating in PI Planning group meetings, with both full organization and individual teams.
• Product releases, pilot programs, and e-commerce application design initiatives.
• Execute assigned projects including develop project schedule, budget, and tracking overall project delivery.
• Liaison between business owners and IT team
• Directed the implementation of system enhancements to meet both business and client requirements.

• Liaison between business owners and IT team
• Directed the implementation of system enhancements to meet both business and client requirements.
• Facilitated UAT/SIT/SME testing for dedicated product.
• SAFE Agile team member
• Worked closely with development teams to ensure quality of the product.
• Created an execution plan for the Product Roadmap
Elevated product quality by leading UAT and SIT, enhancing system functionality for user satisfaction.
Introduced agile methodologies, improving project delivery speed by 30% and enhancing team collaboration.
Streamlined database optimization by documenting precise business requirements, boosting performance.
Strengthened IT and business owner relations, ensuring alignment and smoother project execution.
Directed e-commerce design initiatives, setting new standards for user experience and engagement.
Led UAT and SIT to elevate product quality, ensuring high user satisfaction and system functionality.
2013 - 2021

Senior Business Systems Analyst, Humana, Louisville, KY
• Consulting with business on user story, content and feasibility
• Defect troubleshooting & resolution.
• Conducting workshops for project documentation
• Worked with partner teams on creating requirements for multiple projects.
• Responsible for Humana Pharmacy Sales Tax project, creating multi-million-dollar ROI over multi-year year return.
• Liaison between business owners and IT team
• Assisted/Consulted with UAT testing.
• Facilitated joint application design sessions between business and IT
• Facilitated onboarding training virtual sessions, as well as in-person for new IT associates.
• Drafted Vision and Scope requirement documents
• Assisted in business ask feasibility, based on application capabilities.
• Working and Updating leadership during releases, and warranty

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Certified Scrum Product Owner with over 11 years of IT experience, specializing in healthcare, point- of- service
operations, customer service, and pharmacy sectors. Proven track record in leading agile teams, driving product
development, and delivering multimillion-dollar ROI projects. Skilled in liaising between business and IT, ensuring
product quality through rigorous UAT testing, and fostering collaborative environments.
